title: memory leak for PyTorch -> dlpack -> CuPy
body_html:
Hi again,

for this one, I'm not sure whether it is a cupy or pytorch issue, either, but I don't think this should run out of memory:

import cupy
import torch.utils.dlpack
import gc
for i in range(10000):
  b = torch.randn(1000,1000, device='cuda')
  a = cupy.fromDlpack(torch.utils.dlpack.to_dlpack(b))
  gc.collect()

torch.cuda.memory_allocated() will be high. Again it could be a refcounting thing that things are not going out of scope properly. (In which case it would be more of a CuPy issue.)

Best regards

Thomas
